adDetails: Marin Tails is a full-time (24/7/365) independent professional pet care service. We provide safe, caring and dependable dog walking/pet sitting * boarding services at rates you can afford. Marin Tails is dedicated to be your pets 2nd best friend giving the best care and love they need and deserve! Your dog needs to be loved and exercised daily for health benefits and socialization with their buddies. FREE consultation to go over the specific details in providing the best care for your pet as you wish. We are; Reliable~Dependable~Observant (small groups)~Aware Recommended with many local vets & pet establishments Supporter of animal shelters We are dedicated to your pets!! Bonded & Insured with Pet Sitters Association~Animal Care & Control Established 2003************Outstanding References (long term clients & their pets) http://www.marintails.com
